api_list.name: games_list

optional_parameters.name: exclude_stores
optional_parameters.description: Exclude stores, for example: `5,6`.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

optional_parameters.name: ordering
optional_parameters.description: Available fields: `name`, `released`, `added`, `created`, `updated`, `rating`, `metacritic`. You can reverse the sort order adding a hyphen, for example: `-released`.

optional_parameters.name: exclude_additions
optional_parameters.description: Exclude additions.

optional_parameters.name: metacritic
optional_parameters.description: Filter by a metacritic rating, for example: `80,100`.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Filter by tags, for example: `31,7` or `singleplayer,multiplayer`.

optional_parameters.name: creators
optional_parameters.description: Filter by creators, for example: `78,28` or `cris-velasco,mike-morasky`.

optional_parameters.name: exclude_collection
optional_parameters.description: Exclude games from a particular collection, for example: `123`.

optional_parameters.name: exclude_parents
optional_parameters.description: Exclude games which have additions.

optional_parameters.name: platforms_count
optional_parameters.description: Filter by platforms count, for example: `1`.

optional_parameters.name: updated
optional_parameters.description: Filter by an update date, for example: `2020-12-01,2020-12-31`.

optional_parameters.name: publishers
optional_parameters.description: Filter by publishers, for example: `354,20987` or `electronic-arts,microsoft-studios`.

optional_parameters.name: search_exact
optional_parameters.description: Mark the search query as exact.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

optional_parameters.name: exclude_game_series
optional_parameters.description: Exclude games which included in a game series.

optional_parameters.name: developers
optional_parameters.description: Filter by developers, for example: `1612,18893` or `valve-software,feral-interactive`.

optional_parameters.name: genres
optional_parameters.description: Filter by genres, for example: `4,51` or `action,indie`.

optional_parameters.name: search_precise
optional_parameters.description: Disable fuzziness for the search query.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query.

optional_parameters.name: stores
optional_parameters.description: Filter by stores, for example: `5,6`.

optional_parameters.name: platforms
optional_parameters.description: Filter by platforms, for example: `4,5`.

optional_parameters.name: parent_platforms
optional_parameters.description: Filter by parent platforms, for example: `1,2,3`.
